pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl

    public interface UserDAO
    Interface for performing database operations on User objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<User> getListOfAllUsers(int startResult)
      Returns the list of all users.
      List<User> getListOfUserForGivenSearchParams(String hql, int startResult)

      Returns the number of users for given HQL statement

      Returns TRUE if the given email is unique

        Returns the list of all users for given HQL statement
        Parameters:
